title: Anyone get an answer yet on broken voicemail notification?
content: I have EVERY ALERT TURNED ON and I DON'T have visual voicemail activated, but still when someone leaves a voicemail message I get no notification and can only find out that a message has been left by calling in to my voicemail. This seems to be an issue that has been on going for Pixel users and it also seems that Google has no desire to fix the problem. If I'm wrong and there is a solution can someone let me know. Again, I have all my notifications turned on, even went into advanced to make sure the dot pops up on the app when a message is left, but still I get no notification whatsoever.
